item.chromatics.radiant_chainsaw.tooltip: A powerful tool useful for clearing large areas of trees. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
Breaks the entire tree and damages the tool based on the size of the tree
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.chromatics.radiant_drill.tooltip.su: A powerful tool useful for excavating dirt with ease. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
item.chromatics.radiant_drill.tooltip.be: Gradually increases mining speed the longer you are mining blocks
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.chromatics.radiant_jackhammer.toolt: A powerful tool useful for excavating large patches of minerals. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
Breaks blocks randomly in a radius area around the block you are breaking
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.chromatics.radiant_knife.tooltip.su: A strong blade useful for cutting through enemies. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
item.chromatics.radiant_knife.tooltip.co: When Dropped Near A Light Source
item.chromatics.radiant_knife.tooltip.be: Repairs the tool and consumes the _Light_ _Source_
